H0.text: Which British car did Paddy Hopkirk drive to win the 1964 Monte Carlo Rally. Austin-Healey Sprite

H1.text: Which British car did Paddy Hopkirk drive to win the 1964 Monte Carlo Rally. Lotus Cortina

H2.text: Which British car did Paddy Hopkirk drive to win the 1964 Monte Carlo Rally. Triumph TR4

H3.text: Which British car did Paddy Hopkirk drive to win the 1964 Monte Carlo Rally. MINI COOPER (be specific)

A4.text: The Mini Cooper S won the Monte Carlo Rally in 1964, 1965 and 1967.
